item.title: [Python] [OpenCV; Python] Summary of findcontours function
item.description: I couldn't find any more detailed explanation about findcontours for Python version of OpenCV on the internet, so I'd like to note that I tried it myself. If you made a mistake, please point it out. #findcontours function When you want to extract the contours of an image with OpenCV, use the function findContours. The first argument is the input image, the second argument is the extraction mode, and the third argument is the approximation method.
